summary: This bill, the Southwestern Power Administration Fund Establishment Act, establishes a dedicated fund in the U.S. Treasury for the Southwestern Power Administration (SPA). The fund will consist of SPA receipts, appropriations, and transferred balances from existing accounts. The Secretary of Energy, through the Administrator, will use the fund for operating and maintaining power transmission facilities, marketing power, constructing transmission infrastructure, and covering administrative expenses. Excess funds will be transferred to the Treasury. The bill also includes conforming amendments to related legislation.
